summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Corporate Redesign for Order Management Dashboard. All 12 features tested successfully. The dark theme with red accents and premium corporate look is properly implemented.
passed_tests: Login functionality works correctly - admin user can login with provided credentials
Dashboard loads with new corporate styling - dark theme with red accents visible
Stats cards display correct numbers (ACTIVE: 183, RIMS: 93, S.WHEELS: 33, CAPS: 52, etc.) with red gradient accents
7 stats cards found with .stats-card class and corporate styling applied
10 department columns found with .dept-column class and red accent lines at top
Department columns show correct order counts in bubbles (SALES: 49, DESIGN: 29, PROGRAM: 21, etc.)
182 order cards found with .order-card class and red left border accent
Order card hover effect works - cards shift right with shadow on hover
32 admin notes sections found with .admin-notes class and amber left border styling (3px solid #f59e0b)
182 days counter badges found - 88 safe badges (green), 94 warning badges (red with pulse animation)
4 RUSH orders found with .rush-glow class showing red glow effect animation
Order detail modal opens when clicking an order card - shows customer info, order details, department timing
New Order modal works - opens with form fields for order number, customer name, phone, product type, etc.
Filter tabs (ALL, RIMS, S.WHEELS, CAPS) work correctly - clicking each tab filters the orders
critical_code_review_comments: CSS styling is properly implemented in /app/frontend/src/index.css with .order-card, .stats-card, .dept-column, .admin-notes, .days-badge classes
The ::before pseudo-element on .order-card creates the red gradient accent line at the top
RUSH orders have .rush-glow class with @keyframes rushPulse animation for the glowing effect
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - used existing production data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Corporate redesign CSS changes tested and working. Key CSS classes: .order-card (red left border, hover effect with translateX), .stats-card (red gradient accent at bottom), .dept-column (red accent line at top via ::before), .admin-notes (amber left border), .days-badge-safe (green), .days-badge-warning (red with pulse), .rush-glow (red glow animation). All styling is in /app/frontend/src/index.css. The DashboardPage.jsx applies these classes to the respective components.
